formattedAddress: 135 W 27th St 2nd floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 135 W 27th St 2nd floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: The entire Cynergy staff showed me nothing but kindness and professionalism every step of the way. Scheduling appointments way ahead of time or even last minute was always easy. My therapist Aaron was awesome. Each session he gave me his full attention and took detailed notes of what I was feeling. Each session he remembered details from the last even if they were two weeks apart. Lastly, and most importantly, Aaron's treatment worked! After only a couple of months of regular session and at-home rehab, Aaron helped alleviate my knee pain and get me back to pain-free living.

originalText.text: I loved Cynergy in Chelsea. I worked with Andy Hom after breaking my wrist in a fall. We worked for about 8 weeks, twice a week, and Andy was wonderful: patient, kind, available, with a good sense of humor, and great expertise and knowledge. He gave me many exercises to do at home and was very good about explaining why he was recommending them and how they would assist my recovery.  I made tremendous progress in regaining functionality and I’m very grateful to him. The place itself is calm and welcoming, Taylor at the front desk was always very responsive and helpful. I would recommend them without hesitation. Rebecca Jones

originalText.text:
I look forward to my weekly sessions with Amira.  She makes it fun but always beneficial.   She is always aware of my condition and each week we do exercises that work while always trying new approaches to fix things.
I have had shots, acupuncture and many visits to back doctors but the one consistent "fix" to my back pain has been the exercises that Amira has designed for me.
I would recommend her to anyone needing physical therapy - she will be diligent in finding a plan for you.

originalText.text:
Extremely professional, friendly and effective!
Came in with neck and upper back pain, attended 5-6 sessions where I was given manual therapy and shown a series of stretching and strengthening exercises under the guidance of the talented and lovely Dr. Amira (thank you!). Really recommended!

text.text:

Came in with neck and upper back pain, attended 5-6 sessions where I was given manual therapy and shown a series of stretching and strengthening exercises under the guidance of the talented and lovely Dr. Amira (thank you!). Really recommended!

originalText.text:
I can't recommend Amira and Cynergy PT highly enough! Earlier this year I had a nagging Achilles issue that wasn't being resolved through therapy at a different provider, and my doctor recommended coming to Cynergy. I started seeing improvement after just one appointment (and doing my homework exercises!), and was quickly able to get back to playing volleyball.

I also had a back issue that I thought I could resolve on my own through stretching - wrong! Amira educated me on how I could actually treat the cause of the pain instead of treating the symptoms, and again I am seeing improvements after just a week.

I will - and have! - recommended Amira & Cynergy to anyone looking for a PT. The entire staff is lovely, and the facilities are spacious & well-equipped.
